content:
# FACTORIO FACTORY REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5, -0.5)
- Boiler at position (-5.0, 2.5)
- Steam engine at position (0.5, 6.5)
- Small electric pole at position (3.5, 6.5)
- Additional small electric pole at position (0.5, 8.5)
- Pipe network connecting these components
The system is operational and generating electricity for the factory. The boiler is currently fueled with coal and working properly.

### Iron Mining and Smelting at (19.5, 74.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at position (19.5, 74.5)
- Stone furnace at position (20.0, 77.0)
- Inserter at position (20.5, 78.5)
- Wooden chest at position (20.5, 79.5) for iron plate storage (currently contains 159 iron plates)
- Additional wooden chest at position (20.5, 80.5)
- Small electric pole connecting the system to the power network

### Copper Mining and Smelting at (-49.5, 81.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at position (-49.5, 81.5)
- Stone furnace at position (-49.0, 84.0)
- Inserter at position (-48.5, 85.5)
- Wooden chest at position (-48.5, 86.5) for copper plate storage (currently contains 66 copper plates)
- Additional wooden chest at position (-48.5, 87.5)
- Small electric pole connecting the system to the power network

### Copper Cable Production at (-35.5, 87.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at position (-35.5, 87.5) set to produce copper cables
- Inserter at position (-37.5, 87.5) to feed copper plates
- Wooden chest at position (-38.5, 87.5) for copper plate input
- Inserter at position (-33.5, 87.5) to extract copper cables
- Wooden chest at position (-32.5, 87.5) for copper cable output (currently contains 176 copper cables)
- Small electric pole at position (-39.5, 87.5) connecting the system to the power network

### Electronic Circuit Production at (33.5, 80.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at position (33.5, 80.5) set to produce electronic circuits
- Inserter at position (31.5, 80.5) to feed iron plates
- Wooden chest at position (30.5, 80.5) for iron plate input
- Inserter at position (35.5, 80.5) to feed copper cables
- Wooden chest at position (36.5, 80.5) for copper cable input
- Inserter at position (33.5, 82.5) to extract electronic circuits
- Wooden chest at position (33.5, 83.5) for electronic circuit output (currently contains 54 electronic circuits)
- Small electric pole at position (35.5, 82.5) connecting the system to the power network

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities in occupied spaces
- Check for existing items on the ground before placing chests or other entities
- When placing an entity fails, try increasing the spacing or changing the direction
- Be aware that dropped items on the ground can block entity placement
- Before attempting to place an entity, check if it already exists at the target position

### Errors with inserter power connections
- Ensure all inserters are connected to the power network before expecting them to function
- Several inserters were found not connected to power, causing them to remain inactive
- After placing new power poles, verify that all nearby machines are properly connected

### Errors with insert_item function usage
- The insert_item function requires an Entity or EntityGroup as the second argument, not a Position
- Correct usage: insert_item(Prototype.ItemType, entity_object, quantity)

### Errors with item extraction
- Ensure the source entity actually contains the item you're trying to extract
- When extracting from mining drills, make sure they have had enough time to produce resources
